title: Surprised it worked for other things
text:
I’ve used liquid (99%) when going to bed and use the DMSO when going out in public or when my skin gets irritated from the pure (99%). I used for chronic hip bursitis, lower back pain and tight SI joint.
I noticed I was getting the beginnings of a fever blister. I couldn’t believe it and thought my immune system was compromised. (I haven’t had one since 5 years old, now 50)
I iced it when feeling the onset, took 4,000 mg of Lysine, put DSMO rose on it( never read anything about it concerning this but figured why not, I have it, no side effects besides tasting garlic in your mouth briefly) popped zicam (zinc) tablets every hour, and did a dab of Abreva. The next day the fever blister disappeared almost. Half the size. I told my sister who couldn’t believe it either as she gets them 2x a year.
I would say to use this product (the rose cream first) if you are unfamiliar with DSMO before you graduate to liquid. Now that I know it can be used for anything besides pain, I’m all in.
I will say for pain, when used with other things in combination/conjunction (Joint care by Redd. Remedies), MSM course organic flakes and DSMO, you don’t have to reach for prescription meds. You can find all on amazon. I have all prescription meds under the sun for my condition. Pain meds, muscle relaxers, lidocaine patches..But I am firm believer prescription meds lead to other problems or diseases. Try natural first. My concoction of the 3 natural works wonders. Give them all a week for continuous relief and take at night.
I would be curious to see if this cream works on burns or scratches.
Good luck.

I roll my hair and just spray a bit on the ends before I clip in place.  It Smells Wonderful!!  But the fragrance does not linger - once it dries it disappears.

title: Not good

title: Nice ingredients
text: I'm not sure what this does! For me, there was nothing but a nice scent. I have textured red hair that is coarse and slightly wavy. This only made my hair flat and straight. My friend used it as well on vacation, and she has long black hair that is frizzy if not tamed. This did nothing for her as well. I really wanted to love this after all the great reviews, but....

title: I had super high hopes for this product and was very excited ...
text: I had super high hopes for this product and was very excited to use it. I was only able to get the beach wave look after spraying the product and leaving my hair in braids for many many hours. It's really expensive for the look it gives. The smell is pleasant, but don't expect a quick beach look with this product.

title: Works great as a root booster for fine hair
text: I have a lot of thin hair and this product works best as a root booster before blow drying.  If I put it on dry, it gives my thin hair a stringy look.  However, if I use it before blow drying, it gives it some really nice volume and texture.  Smells amazing, too.

title: Smells good, doesn't do much for curl/styling

The spritz is very light so you need a number of pumps to really dampen hair - I have 2a wavy curls, long hair. My go-to product is Kevin Murphy Hair Resort, I was hoping to use this as a lighter option, or to refresh on day 2...however, found that it doesn't work any differently from tap water except with a nice beach smell.

title: Wavy hair!
text: I love this product.  My daughter received it as a gift at a hotel she stayed in.  I have wavy hair.  Hers is straight so she gave it to me to try.  I loved it and ordered a full size when it was gone.  If my waves have gotten a little wonky, frizzy or need a little refreshing, a few sprays and some scrunching and they look beautiful.  Water does NOT do the same thing.  I am a retired hairdresser and would have loved to have had this on my backbar for my curley haired girls.  PS. Smell is amazing

text: I have naturally wavy hair and with the right product, transforms into deep loose curls.  This product does just that for my hair!  It also smell very nice...a very good product and worth the price.  Not to mention, the glass bottle is priceless and necessary to maintain the quality of the product.

title: Caused breakouts unfortunately
text: This product smells great and added body and waves to my hair - I loved the look and want to love the product, but every time I use it it makes my neck and baseline of my scalp break out. I think the salt clogs my pore causing bumps and breakouts because it has happened every time.

title: Works great and the scent is fantastic.
text: Works great and the scent is fantastic.

title: Smells Wonderful!
text: I want to start by saying this stuff smells fantastic! I have thick and slightly wavy hair and it adds just the right amount of texture. I also use a few spritzes on my hair after I pull it up and it helps keep it smooth and sleek looking. The ingredients are very natural unlike other sea salt sprays. Doesn't dry my hair out and leaves that light scent. I would purchase again. The glass bottle is beautiful and will be great to reuse for something else.

title: Best coconut light scent
text: The scent is amazing, a true beach coconut scent. Gives added texture to hair, but honestly the scent alone is reason to use!

title: Worth the price!!!!
text: I love this. I have thin hair but this product is very light and smells amazing. Works great and i highly recommend it.

title: I ordered a mini version of this first and loved it! I decided to go for the large ...
text: I ordered a mini version of this first and loved it! I decided to go for the large bottle, but when it arrived I was very disappointed. The label is the same as the small one, but there is no scent! The mini smelled like delicious coconut and this smells like nothing. Would love a refund or an exchange for the good smelling stuff.

title: Nice sea salt hair mist
text: The seller packaged this extremely well so there was no breakage issue. I’m trying to find a replacement for Alterna’s “Bamboo 48-Hour Volume Spray” that they sadly discontinued. This doesn’t compare with it in the least but it does add a bit of volume to my fine hair. The scent is pleasing and my hair doesn’t feel crunchy. That being said, I’ll continue my search for a product that works as well as the Alterna spray. So frustrating when a manufacturer discontinues a great product.

title: Expensive but a GREAT product
text: I love this product and the way it leaves my hair wavy! it works like magic! My only complaints- I am all for glass packaging BUT, not in my bathroom! I dropped my first bottle and it shattered all over my tile bathroom floor and I was so bummed- before I even got a chance to use it. Second- it seems really pricey for the ingredients listed, but it smells WONDERFUL and it works WONDERFULLY! I spray it in my hair after my shower right before bed and sleep with my hair wet and when I wake up I have amazing wavy beauty look without any effort- the spray does it all!

title: Where’s the texture?
text: Wanted to love this. Lovely scent but it does nothing.  I’ve used other brands and have always noticed the texture it gives my hair but they were on the expensive side.  Decided to try this brand but found  myself disappointed :(.  It’s like water mist with a beautiful scent.  Won’t but again.

title: Herbivore coconut sea mist is literally the best ever.
text: I've gone through something like four bottles at this point and continuously re-up whenever I'm running out. I like to buy mine locally but if I know I won't have time to get to the store then I'll order online to stay stocked. It's maybe $2 on more for the convenience but it's reliable and the same excellent quality I've become accustomed to.

More expensive than the others. You get what you pay for

title: Very Hydrating
text:
This serum is a milky looking, thin serum that goes on easily and absorbs quickly. After applying, my skin looks hydrated but a bit shiny, probably a result of the squalane.

The serum is ultra hydrating and after 5 days of use, a few dry patches of skin, that nothing had helped, are no longer visible, even after washing my face.

title: Provides Nice Hydration
text:
I like this eye cream. So many eye creams don’t work for me because they cause my eyes to become irritated.

This is a light weight cream that absorbs almost instantly when I place it around my eyes.

I know some reviewers have mentioned that the cream has a scent, but it’s not obvious to me.

I’ve used this eye cream for a week and I have not had any irritation or sensitivity to my skin or eyes.

My eyes do look more hydrated so this is a winner for me.
